name: EIT Custom Scrollbar
author: exclusiveitech

sections.description:
This is free version of EIT Custom Scrollbar. This plugin give your wordpress site a customizable, stylish & responsive scrollbar. You can easily change scrollbar color, width, & others from Settings > EIT Custom Scrollbar Options.

Features & Facilities:

  • Easy to installation
  • Unlimited colors themes
  • Height & Width Customizable
  • Speed & AutoHide mode Customizable
  • Responsive for all devices
  • Custom control plugin
  • Supported of all mejor browsers
  • For all WordPress versions
  • And many more…

If you like this plugin, please do not forget to rate this item

  • Live Demo

Author

Md. Azizur Rahman from StarITSoft

Donate this plugin

Donate via PayPal
sections.installation:
Installing the plugins is just like installing other WordPress plugins. If you don’t know how to install plugins, please review the two options below:

Install from ZIP file:

1. From your WordPress deshboard, go to Plugins > Add New. 2. Select 'Upload' from the set of links at the top of the page (the second link) 3. From here, browse for the ZIP file included in your plugin purchase titled 'eit-custom-scrollbar-wp-free.zip' and click the 'Install Now' button 4. Onse installation is complete, active the plugin to enable its features.

Install by FTP:

1. Find the directory titled 'eit-scrollbar' and upload it and all files within to the plugins directory of your WordPress instal (/WORDPRESS-DIRECTORY/wp-content/plugins/) [e.g.: www.yourdomain.com/wp-content/plugins/] 2. From your WordPress dashboard, chose 'Installed Plugins' option under the 'Plugins' category 3. Locate the newly added plugin and click on the 'Activate' link to enable its features.
sections.faq:
How do I install this plugin?

You can install this plugin as others regular wordpress plugins. No deficulty to instalation. Please see the instalation tab.

How can I get more featurs?

If you need more featur to customiz your scrollbar, you have to buy our premium version. Premium version is comming soon.
sections.changelog:

  • Now you can controll your scrollbar speed.
  • Now you can controll your scrollbar auto hide mode.

1.1

  • Added new features
  • Now you can controll your scrollbar height.

1.0

  • Initial Release
